summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SaaS Financiero application. All backend APIs working correctly with proper JWT authentication, company management, financial data handling, and KPI calculations. Frontend flows including registration, login, company creation, dashboard navigation, and data visualization are functional. Minor UI issues identified with chart rendering and accessibility warnings.

design_issues.issue: Chart width/height calculation errors in console - charts display but show dimension warnings
WebSocket connection to ws://localhost:443/ws fails - not critical for functionality

passed_tests: Financial data addition with KPI calculation
Data validation and duplicate period handling

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor UI warnings only)
